name: Baldi's Basics 5 Years Birthday Bash!
description:
It's been 5 years since Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning was first released, so I made this Decompile.
NOTE: this decompile is work in progress and in early access!
You know, your friend lost his noteboos (even more again), you need to collect 9 notebooks instead of 7.
But, there is 2 math machines in this schoolhouse.

Mystman12: Baldi's Basics

Daniilsuperx, YuraSuper2048: Math Machines
Baldi Mod Maker: Baldicator
